name: verify-auto-refresh-turn-on-and-off-toggle;issue-lt-346-map-view-regression-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-lt23-map-view-lt-52-refresh-incident-data-capability-lt-23-map-view

tags.name: LT 23 Map View/LT-52 Refresh Incident Data

title: verify auto refresh turn on and off toggle

testSteps.description: Given I am at the LiveTraffic Website
Then I should see auto refresh toggle is turned ON by default
Then I should see the display of last refresh info
Then I should see display of updated refresh data info

exception.message: expected 'Auto refresh (Last refreshed at 10:49am)' to not equal 'Auto refresh (Last refreshed at 10:49am)'

testSteps.description: When I turn OFF auto refresh toggle
Then I should see the display of last refresh info
Then I should see same time stamp after 60 seconds

testFailureCause.message: expected 'Auto refresh (Last refreshed at 10:49am)' to not equal 'Auto refresh (Last refreshed at 10:49am)'
